title: Network IDS Alert Triage
description: A SOC analyst receives an alert from a network Intrusion Detection System (IDS) for a potential SQL injection attempt against a web server.

tasks.description: Retrieve the full packet capture (PCAP) associated with the IDS alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully gets the network traffic evidence for the alert.

tasks.description: Analyze the PCAP to confirm that the traffic contains a malicious SQL injection payload.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the presence of 'OR 1=1' in the HTTP request, validating the alert.

tasks.description: Check the web server's logs to see if the attack was successful or if it was blocked by the Web Application Firewall (WAF).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the WAF blocked the request, making the alert a 'blocked attempt' with lower priority.
